parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description:
The ID of the E-HPC cluster.

You can call the [ListClusters](~~87116~~) operation to query the cluster ID.

parameters.name: ComputeInstanceType
parameters.description:
The instance type of the node.

You can call the [ListPreferredEcsTypes](~~188592~~) operation to query the recommended instance types.

parameters.name: DeploymentSetId
parameters.description: The ID of the deployment set. You can obtain the deployment set ID by calling the [DescribeDeploymentSets](~~91313~~) operation. Only the deployment sets that use low latency policy are supported.

parameters.name: NetworkInterfaceTrafficMode
parameters.description:
The communication model of the ENI. Valid values:

*   Standard: uses the TCP communication mode.
*   HighPerformance: uses the remote direct memory access (RDMA) communication mode with the Elastic RDMA Interface (ERI) enabled.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description:
The resource group ID.

You can call the [ListResourceGroups](~~158855~~) operation to query the IDs of resource groups.
